name: dataprep.api_reliability
description: This table contains performance, durations, and number of api requests per day for all endpoints

metadata.comment: The name of the http method (i.e., verb) in the api request
The path of the api endpoint
The name of the team that owns the api
The ID of the org which called the api
The name of the org which called the api
The size segment of the org which called the api -- (e.g., 'AE1', 'AE2/AE3', 'ENT')
The industry of the org which called the api
The date on which this api call was invoked
The access token id which was used to invoke the api -- will be empty if access token was used oauth app
The name assocated with the access token id which was used to invoke the api -- will be empty if access token was used oauth app
The oauth token id which was used to invoke the api -- will be empty if access token was used instead
The uuid of the oauth app which was used to invoke the api -- will be empty if access token was used instead
The name of the oauth app which was used to invoke the api -- will be empty if access token was used instead
The number of api requests which took <= 5 seconds to complete
The total number of api requests
The total time it took to complete all of the api requests in ms
The number of api requests whose responses returned with status codes 5xx
The average request duration in milliseconds -- (total_duration_ms / num_api_requests_daily)
The percentage of successful api requests -- (num_api_requests_daily - num_fails_daily) / num_api_requests_daily
The percentage of api requests that completed in less than 5 seconds -- (num_api_requests_less_than_or_equal_to_5_seconds_daily / num_api_requests_daily) * 100
The request line of the api request -- (http_method + ' ' + path_template)
